title: Expansionary MP - effect on PL and RGDP

content.question: In the short run, an expansionary monetary policy would most likely result in which of the following changes in the price level and real gross domestic product (GDP) ?

choices.label: Price Level Real GDP Decrease Increase
Price Level Real GDP No change Decrease
Price Level Real GDP Increase No change
Price Level Real GDP Increase Decrease
Price Level Real GDP Increase Increase

content.answer: Price Level Real GDP Increase Increase

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
